item.title: -=Giving player a Unique Look.....=-
item.dc:creator: @mopargenius mopargenius
item.description:
@mopargenius wrote:

ok sure,

[code]
//Setting player standard look
playerLook[0] = 7;
playerLook[1] = 21;
playerLook[2] = 28;
playerLook[3] = 33;
playerLook[4] = 40;
playerLook[5] = 44;

	/*playerLook[0] = 7;
	playerLook[1] = 21;
	playerLook[2] = 28;
	playerLook[3] = 33;
	playerLook[4] = 40;
	playerLook[5] = 44;*/

	[b]//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=1165;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=1;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=2501;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2495;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3105;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=861;[/b]

/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: -=Giving player a Unique Look.....=-
item.dc:creator: @mopargenius mopargenius
item.description:
@mopargenius wrote:

ok, i can help ya here, go into player.java

search this.

//Giving the player an unique look

under it you will see some thing like

playerEquipment[playerHat]=1165; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=2501; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2495; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3105; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=861;

sorry if codee dont work but, change the ids like this

playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3105; if thats the code change 3105 to the item id you want

cheers

Read full topic
